list.en: I wish you'll help me in work.
list.cn: 我希望你能在工作上帮助我。

list.en: I'm very glad that you can join us.
list.cn: 我很高兴你能加入我们。

list.en: I'm a newcomer.
list.cn: 我是新来的。

list.en: I'll show you your private office.
list.cn: 我带你去看你的私人办公室。

list.en: I'm very happy to be going to be working together.
list.cn: 我很高兴能在一起工作。

list.en: If there is anything I can do to help, just let me know.
list.cn: 如果有什么我能帮忙的，尽管告诉我。

list.en: Let me introduce myself.
list.cn: 让我自我介绍一下。

list.en: Could you introduce me to the others?
list.cn: 你能把我介绍给其他人吗?

list.en: How do you train new employees?
list.cn: 你们如何培训新员工?

list.en: Have you received the job training?
list.cn: 你接受过工作培训吗?

list.en: How long will the training last?
list.cn: 培训将持续多长时间?

list.en: Have you got any special training in programming before?
list.cn: 你以前接受过编程方面的特殊训练吗?

list.en: What kind of training have you received before you come here?
list.cn: 你来这里之前接受过什么培训?

list.en: What is the specific task to me?
list.cn: 我的具体任务是什么?

list.en: If you meet any trouble, just go ahead to ask me.
list.cn: 如果你有什么困难，尽管来找我。

list.en: All the newcomers will receive an on the job training.
list.cn: 所有的新员工都将接受上岗培训。

list.en: You'll be assigned to the sales department.
list.cn: 你将被分配到销售部。

list.en: I'll be training you today.
list.cn: 今天由我来训练你。

list.en: We have a two week training program.
list.cn: 我们有一个为期两周的培训计划。

list.en: Can you cover for me on wednesday?
list.cn: 星期三你能替我个班吗?

list.en: Will you cover for me?
list.cn: 你能替我吗?

list.en: How do you feel about working overtime?
list.cn: 你对加班有什么看法?

list.en: Who was covering for you?
list.cn: 谁替你打掩护?

list.en: I'll cover for you, but you have to substitute for me tomorrow.
list.cn: 我替你的班，但明天你得替我。

list.en: Are you working late tonight?
list.cn: 你今晚要工作到很晚吗?

list.en: I don't like to work day and night.
list.cn: 我不喜欢没日没夜地工作。

list.en: I need you to stay and work with me.
list.cn: 我需要你留下来和我一起工作。

list.en: Could you work late this evening?
list.cn: 今天晚上你能加班吗?

list.en: I've been working overtime recently.
list.cn: 我最近一直在加班。

list.en: I hope you will have a good time here.
list.cn: 我希望你在这里过得愉快。

list.en: I'm very pleased to be here.
list.cn: 我很高兴来到这里。

list.en: Shall I book a room for you?
list.cn: 我给您订个房间好吗?

list.en: Anybody picks you up at the airport?
list.cn: 有人去机场接你吗?

list.en: How will I recognize you?
list.cn: 我怎样才能认出你?

list.en: I'm looking for Mr green from the United States.
list.cn: 我在找来自美国的格林先生。

list.en: I'm appointed as your accompaniment during your stay in Shanghai.
list.cn: 我被指定为你在上海期间的陪同人员。

list.en: Did you have a pleasant trip?
list.cn: 旅途愉快吗?

list.en: Did you sleep well last night?
list.cn: 你昨晚睡得好吗?

list.en: Can you help me type the contract?
list.cn: 你能帮我打这份合同吗?

list.en: You have helped me a lot today.
list.cn: 你今天帮了我很多忙。

list.en: Can you help me to sign this document?
list.cn: 你能帮我在这份文件上签字吗?

list.en: Can you do me a favor to operate this typewriter?
list.cn: 你能帮我操作一下这台打字机吗?

list.en: Could you give me a hand to send an email?
list.cn: 你能帮我发封邮件吗?

list.en: Could you help me to ask for a leave?
list.cn: 你能帮我请个假吗?

list.en: Appreciate your time.
list.cn: 感谢你的宝贵时间。

list.en: I will treat you a meal for your help in my work.
list.cn: 我要请你吃一顿饭，感谢你对我工作的帮助。

list.en: They're really running you into the ground.
list.cn: 他们真的把你累垮了。

list.en: I don't understand wonder why the manager is so hard on me.
list.cn: 我不明白为什么经理对我这么严厉。

list.en: I'm really Fed up with Mike.
list.cn: 我真的受够迈克了。

list.en: He's the biggest airhead I've ever met.
list.cn: 他是我见过的最愚蠢的人。

list.en: Don't talk with me while I'm in the middle of typing.
list.cn: 别在我打字的时候和我说话。

list.en: I wish you'd stop nagging me.
list.cn: 我希望你不要再唠叨我了。

list.en: Why did you have to give me this rush job now?
list.cn: 你为什么要现在给我这个急件?

list.en: Don't you think you're using telephone too much for personal calls?
list.cn: 你不觉得你打私人电话用得太多了吗?

list.en: How come everyone in our company middle age stuffy?
list.cn: 为什么我们公司的人都是中年人?

list.en: I don't understand what's going on inside these young people's head.
list.cn: 我不明白这些年轻人的脑子里在想什么。

list.en: I don't see why you are kicking up such a fuss.
list.cn: 我不明白你为什么要这么大惊小怪。

list.en: Put up or shut up.
list.cn: 你行你上啊。

list.en: The boss invites us to dinner.
list.cn: 老板请我们吃饭。

list.en: I meet some new friends at the party.
list.cn: 我在聚会上认识了一些新朋友。

list.en: It is an informal party.
list.cn: 这是一个非正式的聚会。

list.en: It is good for building relationships among colleagues.
list.cn: 这有助于在同事之间建立关系。

list.en: I've been trying to figure out when we should have the new year's party.
list.cn: 我一直在想我们什么时候开新年派对。

list.en: You make the invitations.
list.cn: 你发出邀请。

list.en: The party will last from three PM to five PM.
list.cn: 晚会将从下午三点持续到五点。

list.en: Everybody can just go home after the party.
list.cn: 派对结束后大家都可以回家了。

list.en: Are you ready to order or just a minute?
list.cn: 您准备好点菜了吗，还是稍等一会儿?

list.en: I chatted with my colleagues at the party.
list.cn: 我在聚会上和同事们聊天。

list.en: We can wear ordinary suits.
list.cn: 我们可以穿普通的衣服。

list.en: I received an invitation.
list.cn: 我收到了一份邀请。

list.en: I don't want to take part in the party.
list.cn: 我不想参加这个聚会。

list.en: The party can make you relax.
list.cn: 聚会可以使你放松。

list.en: Enjoy yourselves at the party.
list.cn: 在聚会上玩得开心。

list.en: Could you tell me what I should do to prepare for a meeting?
list.cn: 你能告诉我我应该为会议做什么准备吗?

list.en: You should ensure that those you intend to be present are properly informed.
list.cn: 你应该确保那些你打算出席的人得到适当的通知。

list.en: What should I do during the meeting?
list.cn: 会议期间我该做些什么?

list.en: You should take notes.
list.cn: 你应该做笔记。

list.en: The meeting is scheduled on friday.
list.cn: 会议安排在星期五。

list.en: The meeting has been arranged for monday evening.
list.cn: 会议安排在星期一晚上。

list.en: Please arrange the next meeting at a convenient time.
list.cn: 请在方便的时间安排下次会议。

list.en: I set up a meeting.
list.cn: 我安排了一次会面。

list.en: The arrangement for the meeting has been made.
list.cn: 会议安排已经安排好了。

list.en: What's my schedule for today?
list.cn: 我今天的日程安排是什么?

list.en: What's my schedule like?
list.cn: 我的日程安排是怎样的?

list.en: Please leave it in my post box.
list.cn: 请把它放在我的邮箱里。

list.en: I've arranged today's reports for you to check.
list.cn: 我已经安排好今天的报告给你看。

list.en: I am at your disposal manager.
list.cn: 我任你差遣，经理。

list.en: Have you found those files I requested?
list.cn: 你找到我要的那些文件了吗?

list.en: I'll get those plans over to your office tomorrow.
list.cn: 明天我会把这些计划送到你的办公室。

list.en: Do you have any particular instructions for this?
list.cn: 你对此有什么特别的指示吗?

list.en: Let me see the agenda for this next meeting, please.
list.cn: 请让我看看下次会议的议程。

list.en: Would you please file these documents for me?
list.cn: 你能帮我把这些文件归档吗?
